类 BigTwoCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
      • BigTwoCard
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class BigTwoCard
extends Card
    This class is a subclass of the Card class, and is used to model a card used in a Big Two card game.
    作者:
    Yunhao Liu
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      构造器和说明

      This is the constructor for the BigTwoCard

      Compares this card with the specified card for order.

      • 从类继承的方法 Card

        equals, getRank, getSuit, hashCode, toString

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BigTwoCard

        public BigTwoCard(int suit,
                  int rank)
        This is the constructor for the BigTwoCard
        参数:
        suit - the suit of the given card, from 0 to 3

        0 = Diamond, 1 = Club, 2 = Heart, 3 = Spade

        rank - the rank of the given card, from 0 to 12

        0 = 'A', 1 = '2', 2 = '3', ..., 8 = '9', 9 = '0', 10 = 'J', 11 = 'Q', 12 = 'K'

    • 方法详细资料

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card card)
        Compares this card with the specified card for order.
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable<Card>
        覆盖:
        compareTo 在类中 Card
        参数:
        card - the card to be compared
        返回:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this card is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified card
